description: 5 weekly online quizzes (first 5 weeks) with 2 vector calculus and 2 complex analysis questions each. Unlimited attempts with best 4 out of 5 marks counted. Includes automated feedback.
Two 40-minute in-class tests during Week 8 covering vector calculus and complex analysis. Provides progress feedback before the final exam.

2-hour exam during the official university examination period. Covers all course topics with 4 free-form questions. Requires minimum 40% in each component (Vector Calculus and Complex Analysis) and overall 50% to pass.
